text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with Irish pork stew that's right
this is what we're supposed to be eating

we're going to brown those pork chunks

first transfer that to a bowl put the

here so we're going to dump in a bottle

that's going to thicken up pretty

we're going to go ahead and dump our

we're simply going to cook this
